tasks.name: driverEvent_30ce
tasks.caption: When connection to driver notifies a {{event}} event

_inputs.name: netCoreSdkVersion
_inputs.label: .Net Core SDK Version
_inputs.description: Set the .net core SDK version to use, when multiple are installed in the system where the driver is running. Leave empty to ignore this setting.

_inputs.name: transportProtocol
_inputs.label: Transport Protocol
_inputs.description: Protocol used to communicate with the endpoints

_inputs.name: driverHandle
_inputs.label: Driver CFX Handle
_inputs.description: Driver CFX Handle (e.g. <maker>.<model>.<serial>)

_inputs.name: driverEndPoint
_inputs.label: Driver CFX EndPoint
_inputs.description: Driver CFX EndPoint (e.g. amqp://127.0.0.1:5673/)

_inputs.name: driverAddress
_inputs.label: Driver Address
_inputs.description: Driver CFX Message Source. Internal queue for sending messages.

_inputs.name: driverUsername
_inputs.label: Driver Username
_inputs.description: Username to use for authentication. Use with amqps.

_inputs.name: driverPassword
_inputs.label: Driver Password
_inputs.description: Password to use for authentication. Use with amqps.

_inputs.name: brokerEndPoint
_inputs.label: Broker EndPoint
_inputs.description: Broker EndPoint that we are going to use to connect to.

_inputs.name: brokerExchange
_inputs.label: Broker Exchange
_inputs.description: The Broker exchange we are going to be publish to.

_inputs.name: brokerQueue
_inputs.label: Broker Queue
_inputs.description: The Broker queue to be used to subscribe messages.

_inputs.name: brokerUsername
_inputs.label: Broker Username
_inputs.description: Username to use for authentication. Use with amqps.

_inputs.name: brokerPassword
_inputs.label: Broker Password
_inputs.description: Password to use for authentication. Use with amqps.

_inputs.name: targetHandle
_inputs.label: Target Handle
_inputs.description: Target CFX Handle (e.g. <maker>.<model>.<serial>), machine CFX Handle that we are going to communicate with.

_inputs.name: targetEndPoint
_inputs.label: Target EndPoint
_inputs.description: Target CFX EndPoint (e.g. amqp://127.0.0.1:5672/), machine CFX EndPoint that we are going to communicate with.

_inputs.name: targetAddress
_inputs.label: Target Address
_inputs.description: Target Address (i.e. /queue/machine), machine CFX Address that we are going to communicate with.

_inputs.name: targetUsername
_inputs.label: Username
_inputs.description: Username to use for authentication. Use with amqps.

_inputs.name: targetPassword
_inputs.label: Password
_inputs.description: Password to use for authentication. Use with amqps.

_inputs.name: certificatesRootFolder
_inputs.label: Certificates Root Folder
_inputs.description: Absolute path of the root folder for the Public Key Infrastructure. Allows the use of tokens ${temp} or ${tmp} for the OS temporary folder and token ${id} for replacing with the respective driver instance id

_inputs.name: certificate
_inputs.label: Certificate
_inputs.description: Own certificate - can be either a path to a file or the contents of the file in plain text. Format should be 'pem'

_inputs.name: privateKey
_inputs.label: Private Key
_inputs.description: Own private key - can be either a path to a file or the contents of the file in plain text. Format should be 'pem'

_inputs.name: connectionReconnectInterval
_inputs.label: Connection Reconnect Interval
_inputs.description: The time interval between attempts to reconnect publish or subscriber channels after a network interruption, in seconds.

_inputs.name: connectionRequestTimeout
_inputs.label: Connection Request Timeout
_inputs.description: When executing a point to point request/response call to another CFX endpoint, this time span specifies the maximum amount of time that this endpoint will wait for the other endpoint to respond before timing out, in seconds.

_inputs.name: useLowLevelLogging
_inputs.label: Use Low Level Logging
_inputs.description: Whether or not to use low level logging

_inputs.name: eventsExpiration
_inputs.label: Events Expiration
_inputs.description: Time in seconds before an event is considered expired.

_inputs.name: onRequestReceivedTimeoutReply
_inputs.label: On Request Received Timeout Reply
_inputs.description: Internal time to wait for a reply to an external request, by the controller

_inputs.name: messagesToIgnore
_inputs.label: Messages to Ignore
_inputs.description: List of messages that are to be ignored and discarded.

_inputs.name: logMessagesFromOtherSources
_inputs.label: Log Messages From Other Sources
_inputs.description: Whether or not to log messages from other sources
